entry.title: 2025 Buckeye CTF
entry.content:
Character Assassination (248 solves)

You could leak the flag byte by byte with an out-of-bounds read with negative index

Chirp (108 solves)

Format string attack

Guessing Game (78 solves)

Leak canary with binary search and stack buffer overflow

Printful (33 solves)

Format string attack -> ROP

Bashtille (29 solves)

Chroot with root permission.
It could be escaped from the jail with chdir + chroot.
No executable flag is needed when runs a binary file with ld.so

IloveRust (18 solves)

Classic heap challenge with notes

entry.title: 2025 Infobahn CTF
entry.content:
PwnSet (25 solves)

Format string attack with syslog function to modify got address to a guessed oneshot gadget address

Book Manager V2 (17 solves)

Classic heap challenge but written in free pascal.

The Butterfly Effect (14 solves)

V8 challenge gives you a bitflip one time to an out-of-bounds element.

Pwn A Brainrot (5 solves)

You can leak the addresses and overwrite everything with one out-of-bounds bug.
